AnotherButton.changelog:
# 1.0.8 - The "Pixel Perfect" Update 🎨✨
* 🌈 **Ultimate Color Picker:** Added a pro-grade **Color Wheel**, **RGB Sliders**, **Live Preview**, and **20+ Presets**.
* 📐 **Responsive UI:** The entire interface now scales intelligently (DP) to fit any screen size perfectly.
* 🎛️ **Compact Cards:** A complete redesign of the settings menu with stacked inputs and a cleaner action bar.
* 🐛 **Bug Squashing:** Fixed the button appearing in Search/Emoji bars and resolved Hex code sync issues.

# 1.0.7 - Visual Polish 📱
* 🤏 **Compact Mode:** The popup modal is now slimmer and optimized for better visibility.
* ✨ **Juicy Feedback:** Added satisfying ripple and hover effects to all buttons.
* 🛠️ **Stability:** General layout fixes and performance improvements.

# 1.0.6 - The "Power User" Update 📂
* 📁 **Folders:** You can now create nested sub-menus by converting buttons into folders!
* 👻 **Ghost Mode:** "Popup Opacity" now applies to the entire menu, including the buttons themselves.
* 🧱 **Grid Layout:** Redesigned the button management list into a cleaner 2-column grid.

# 1.0.5 - Customization Unleashed 🧩
* 📝 **Templates:** Added support for `{variable}` inputs to create dynamic message prompts.
* 🎨 **Rainbows:** You can now set custom colors for individual buttons.
* 🔠 **Smart Keywords:** Updated syntax to `[brackets]` (e.g. `[Math]`, `[Dice]`) and added categories.
* 🛡️ **Safety First:** Added confirmation dialogs to prevent accidental deletions.

# 1.0.4 - Context Awareness 🌍
* 🔒 **Context Lock:** Added the ability to restrict buttons to specific **Servers** or **Channels**.

# 1.0.3 - Data Protection 💾
* ⚠️ **Unsaved Changes:** Added visual "Unsaved*" indicators to prevent data loss before exiting.

# 1.0.2 - Granular Control ⚙️
* 🔧 **Config:** Added individual configuration options for each button.

# 1.0.1 - Peace of Mind 🔄
* 💾 **Auto-Save:** Implemented background saving so you never lose your work.

# 1.0.0 - Liftoff! 🚀
* 🎉 **Initial Release:** The journey begins.
